snippet: Germany took a hard-earned 1-0 victory over Portugal in its opening match of Euro 2012 with a late goal by Mario Gomez, who made an unexpected start.
abstract: Germany takes a hard-earned 1-0 victory over Portugal in its opening match of Euro 2012 soccer championships; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Germany took a hard-earned 1-0 victory over Portugal in its opening match of Euro 2012 with a late goal by Mario Gomez, who made an unexpected start.

headline.seo: Euro 2012 — Late Goal by Mario Gomez Lifts Germany
headline.main: With Goal for Germany, Mario Gomez Vindicates Coach’s Faith
headline.print_headline: What German Star Does Routinely, He Finally Does for Germany
